meanings.definition: a person or thing that causes disunity
meanings.sent1: The disuniters in the group constantly stirred up arguments.
meanings.sent2: The presence of disuniters can disrupt harmony within a team.
meanings.sent3: The disuniters at the party kept changing the music, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her negative comments acted as disuniters, driving a wedge between friends.
meanings.sent5: The disuniters in the classroom made it hard for everyone to work together.

meanings.sent1: He always disuniters the team by spreading rumors.
meanings.sent2: Gossip can easily disuniters a close-knit community.
meanings.sent3: The siblings disuniters over who gets to use the TV first.
meanings.sent4: His selfish actions disuniters the once peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The politician's speech disuniters the nation, leading to protests.

meanings.sent1: The disuniters group struggled to agree on a plan.
meanings.sent2: The project failed due to disuniters ideas among the team.
meanings.sent3: The disuniters puzzle pieces didn't fit together properly.
meanings.sent4: Their disuniters approach resulted in a messy outcome.
meanings.sent5: The disuniters team couldn't work together effectively.
